title: Health Alert Network (HAN)
cleaned_text: The Health Alert Network (HAN) contains public health information for medical providers, including: |Emergency Reporting Phone Numbers| 212-447-2030| All Health Alerts and Advisories are in PDF format. You need to have [Adobe Reader](https://get.adobe.com/reader/) to read PDF files. [CDC's Health Alert Network (HAN)](https://emergency.cdc.gov/han/index.asp) 2022 2021 2020 2019 2022 2021 2020 2019
